K12D0731_H0609:473b-1: a'arya t'a ra aashta gho re t'a sb'i s'u tra /
K12D0731_H0609:473b-3: 'phags ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa'i mdo /
K12D0731_H0609:473b-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0731_H0609:473b-5: rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0731_H0609:474a-0: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal @474a *//
K12D0731_H0609:474a-1: lo; ;'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12D0731_H0609:474a-2: bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi steng lho'i gnas na bzhugs te /
K12D0731_H0609:474a-3: de nyid du 'khor rnams kyi nang nas lha mo
K12D0731_H0609:474a-4: sgrol mas 'di skad ces smras so; ;mtho ris rin
K12D0731_H0609:474a-6: las dang las kyi 'bras bu shes par byos //
K12D0731_H0609:474a-7: bzang po sten cing ngan pa spang bar gyis //
K12D0731_H0609:474a-8: gang dag sdig pa'i las rnams spyod byed pa //
K12D0731_H0609:474a-9: 'jig rten pha rol thur du 'bab 'gyur te //
K12D0731_H0609:474a-10: dud 'gro glen lkugs gcig la gcig za dang //
K12D0731_H0609:474a-11: gyen thur 'bab 'dzeg g-yang sa ngal ba'i lam //
K12D0731_H0609:474a-12: 'jigs shing dngangs skrag shin tu skyi g-ya' ba //
K12D0731_H0609:474a-13: zon dang bcas pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab //
K12D0731_H0609:474a-14: yi dvags ltogs shing skom dang lus mi 'tsham //
K12D0731_H0609:474a-15: bza' btung snang yang gzhan gyis bsrungs pa dang //
K12D0731_H0609:474a-16: kha cig zos kyang me dang mtshon du 'gyur //
K12D0731_H0609:474a-17: ltogs shing skom pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab //
K12D0731_H0609:474a-18: dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can de dag ni //
K12D0731_H0609:474a-19: rang dbang med par gshin rje gdug pas khrid //
K12D0731_H0609:474a-20: bsregs shing btsos te mtshon gyis rab tu 'thug /
K12D0731_H0609:474a-21: bsran glags med pa'i sdug bsngal tsha dang grang //
K12D0731_H0609:474a-22: des na tshe 'dir sdig pa'i las byed pa //
K12D0731_H0609:474a-23: rang gis rang la mngan ni cher byas yin //
K12D0731_H0609:474a-24: bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs //
K12D0731_H0609:474a-25: thar pa'i dus med bsran pa'i glags kyang med //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-0: dran pa gsal @474b bas las kyi 'bras bur shes //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-1: sdug bsngal ma bzong smre sngags rang la rmo //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-2: skad ngan drag po'i ku sgras gzhan yang skrag /
K12D0731_H0609:474b-3: de la sogs te sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-4: gang dag nyes dmigs rab tu shes gyis la //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-5: ngan song gsum gyi rgyu rnams rab tu spangs //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-6: sdig pa'i rnam pa phra rags gang la yang //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-7: lus ngag yid kyi sgo nas spyad ta re //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-8: rang yang bde la 'gro rnams yongs la phan //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-9: chags sdang rmongs spangs snying rje'i rtsa ba brtan //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-10: sgo gsum dang bas 'bad de dge ba spyad //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-11: shin tu zab pa'i snying po 'di la 'bad //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-12: me tog sad kyis khyer ba'i 'bras bu la //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-13: so nam byas kyang myu gu mi skye ltar //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-14: sdom nyams the tshom zos pa'i gang zag gis //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-15: shin tu zab pa'i rig sngags bsgrub gyur kyang //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-16: byin brlabs 'byung ngo snyam yang 'byung mi srid //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-17: rtsol ba de dag nga la ba don med 'gyur //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-18: rig sngags de yang skye bo'i tshig dang mtshungs //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-19: ting 'dzin rnams kyang byis pa'i bsam pa 'dra //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-20: skyon med skyes bus rig sngags de bsgrubs na //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-21: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du myur du 'grub //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-22: dper na n+ya gro dha yi sa bon ni //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-23: shin tu phra yang chu lud legs bran na //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-24: dgung zla bdun na dpag tshad tsam du skye //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-25: bems po phyi yi 'gyur yang de 'dra na //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-26: rig pas rig pa bsgrub pa lta ci smos //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-27: 'od gsal nang gi 'gyur la dpag tu med //
K12D0731_H0609:474b-28: tshong dpon lam la mkhas pa dag la brten //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-1: tshags legs pas rgya mtshor zhugs gyur na //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-2: rin chen 'dod pa bzhin du rnyed gyur nas //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-3: rang gi gnas su legs par phyin pa yin //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-4: byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms rten //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-5: byang chub sems ldan dge ba spyad gyur na //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-6: yang dag rdzogs kyi lam la zhugs 'gyur te //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-7: nges par mkhyen nyid sa la 'gro bar 'gyur //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-8: mda' nyid skyes bu'i 'theb nas shor gyur na //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-9: mi 'phang snyam yang shin tu 'phangs par 'gyur //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-10: chos nyid don kun chub pa'i gang zag ni //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-11: mi phyin snyam yang pha rol phyin par 'gyur //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-12: bya cha'i rnam pa rang bzhin rdzogs gyur nas //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-13: sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'thob par the tshom med //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-14: chos nyid rnam par dag pa de rtogs na //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-15: bdag med srog med srog kyang gcad du med //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-16: las med de yi rnam par smin pa med //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-17: mtha' rnams rab spangs skyes bu rnam par grol //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-18: de don rtogs phyir bdag gis bshad pa yi //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-19: snying po 'di la gus pas bzlas gyur na //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-20: bskal pa grangs med gsum gyi sdig kyang 'dzad //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-21: ngan song gsum dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal kun //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-22: rab tu sbyong zhing sgrib pa rnams kyang 'dag /
K12D0731_H0609:475a-23: don dang ldan pa'i snying po 'di lta ste //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-24: aom byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mo /
K12D0731_H0609:475a-25: lha mo khyod kyis bskyab tu gsol //
K12D0731_H0609:475a-26: aom na mo a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0731_H0609:475b-0: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a @475b ma; tadya th'a /
K12D0731_H0609:475b-1: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sarba dusht'an /
K12D0731_H0609:475b-2: pra dusht'an ma ma kri te /
K12D0731_H0609:475b-9: ma ma a'ary'a ba lo bha y'a na r'a /
K12D0731_H0609:475b-13: aa dhishthi te ma ma sarba karma a'a ba ra na sva bh'a ba /
K12D0731_H0609:475b-15: sho dha ya bi sho dha ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0731_H0609:475b-16: de nas sangs rgyas nyid kyis su //
K12D0731_H0609:475b-17: lha mo nyid la rab tu bstod //
K12D0731_H0609:475b-18: thugs rje shin tu che bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad ma //
K12D0731_H0609:475b-19: mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs shing rin chen rgyan gyis spras //
K12D0731_H0609:475b-20: shin tu mdzes tshul 'dzum zhing bzhad pa'i bzhin //
K12D0731_H0609:475b-21: spyan gyi skye mched zar ma'i padma 'dra; ;snyan gyi skye mched aug cos bye ba 'dra //
K12D0731_H0609:475b-22: shangs kyi skye mched autpal bum bu 'dra //
K12D0731_H0609:475b-23: zhal gyi skye mched ha lo rgyas pa 'dra //
K12D0731_H0609:475b-24: sna tshogs sku mnga' na chung mtshan ldan sku //
K12D0731_H0609:475b-25: chos kyi sgra sgrogs ka la ping ka'i gsung //
K12D0731_H0609:475b-26: sems can kun la byams mgon thugs rje'i thugs //
K12D0731_H0609:475b-27: 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos padma g-yon //
K12D0731_H0609:475b-28: sems can don rnams mdzad phyir skyabs sbyin g-yas //
K12D0731_H0609:475b-29: thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs //
K12D0731_H0609:475b-30: rje btsun sgrol ma la ni skyabs su mchi //
K12D0731_H0609:475b-31: 'khor ba'i g-yang sa che las bdag skyobs shig /
K12D0731_H0609:475b-32: 'gro drug rang kha'i gnas su 'khor ra re //
K12D0731_H0609:475b-33: thugs rje chen mo'i zhags pas bdag zung shig /
K12D0731_H0609:475b-34: ngan song gsum gyi gnas su shor ra re //
K12D0731_H0609:475b-35: 'khyams med pa yi lam du bdag chug shig /
K12D0731_H0609:475b-36: log par lta ba'i rigs su skyes sa re //
K12D0731_H0609:476a-2: bshes gnyen ngan pa dag dang phrad ta re'o //
K12D0731_H0609:476a-3: seng ge glang chen me dang sbrul //
K12D0731_H0609:476a-4: mi rgod chu dang rims rnams dang //
K12D0731_H0609:476a-5: sha zas 'jigs pa brgyad po las //
K12D0731_H0609:476a-6: skyob mdzad khyed la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0731_H0609:476a-8: 'jigs pa brgyad las bskyab tu gsol //
K12D0731_H0609:476a-9: pha rol 'bras bu ma thob par dag tu //
K12D0731_H0609:476a-10: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dang //
K12D0731_H0609:476a-11: bsam gtan shes rab thabs dang smon lam dang //
K12D0731_H0609:476a-12: stobs dang de bzhin ye shes pha rol phyin //
K12D0731_H0609:476a-13: bcu po de dang mi 'bral 'grogs par shog /
K12D0731_H0609:476a-14: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las chos 'di bri ba dang /
K12D0731_H0609:476a-18: tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang /
K12D0731_H0609:476a-19: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher bstan par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
K12D0731_H0609:476a-20: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams yi rangs te mngon par bstod do //
